sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_431105_cand_ass_requirement_library"> <x_431105_cand_ass_requirement_library action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category>education_and_training</category> <default_for display_value="Eligibility">0c55a1d497442110a4deb9dfe153af5f</default_for> <number>RLB0001002</number> <period_days/> <period_months>36</period_months> <period_years/> <requirement>A level of education which corresponds to completed university studies of at least 3 years, attested by a diploma in chemistry, chemical engineering, mineralogy, mining, toxicology, ecotoxicology, biology, environmental studies, human or veterinary medicine, pharmacology, or by a diploma in another subject directly relevant to the nature of the duties.</requirement> <requirement_title>Education in chemicals field [3 years]</requirement_title> <sys_created_by>nappoma</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-05-12 14:13:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>3adb150597b2611006f1bfb6f053afef</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>nappoma</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-05-12 14:15:34</sys_updated_on> </x_431105_cand_ass_requirement_library> </record_update>
